name: unknown_top_level_keys
fix: Remove unknown keys or move them to the correct section per schema/examples.

name: missing_required_sections
fix: Ensure the file is an OpenClaw config; include key sections like cron/gateway/heartbeat/channels/plugins.

name: invalid_schedule_every_ms
fix: Set schedule.everyMs to a sensible positive integer (ms). Avoid too-frequent schedules unless intended.

name: cron_job_payload_sessionTarget_mismatch
fix: Match sessionTarget and payload.kind: main→systemEvent, isolated→agentTurn.

name: cron_job_missing_tz
fix: Set schedule.tz explicitly (e.g., Asia/Shanghai) to avoid timezone drift.

name: duplicate_job_names_or_ids
fix: Make cron job names/ids unique to avoid confusion and unexpected overrides.

name: missing_webhook_auth_or_secret
fix: Configure a strong secret/token for inbound webhooks and avoid committing it to public repos.

name: plaintext_tokens_in_config
fix: Move secrets to env vars or a secrets manager; commit only .env.example / placeholders.

name: channel_missing_required_fields
fix: Fill required channel/plugin fields (token/chatId/etc.) as per plugin docs.

name: file_paths_outside_workspace_or_nonexistent
fix: Use workspace-relative paths and ensure referenced files/directories exist.

name: cron_only_partial_config
fix: If this is a cron-only snippet, merge it into a full OpenClaw config (with gateway/heartbeat/channels/plugins) before linting.

name: top_level_cronJobs_compat
fix: Prefer cron.jobs. If you have a legacy config/snippet, move cronJobs under cron.jobs for consistency.

name: missing_gateway_section
fix: Add a gateway section (or generate a baseline config) so OpenClaw can run reliably.

name: missing_heartbeat_section
fix: Add a heartbeat section (or generate a baseline config) so scheduled checks/reminders can run.

name: cron_missing_expr
fix: For schedule.kind=cron, set a non-empty schedule.expr string (e.g. "0 9 * * 1").

name: top_level_jobs_fallback
fix: Prefer cron.jobs. If you used a top-level jobs array/object, move it under cron.jobs to avoid ambiguity.

name: feishu_groupPolicy_open
fix: If you use Feishu groups, set channels.feishu.groupPolicy=allowlist and configure groupAllowFrom to restrict who can trigger the bot.

name: duplicate_plugin_ids
fix: Ensure each plugins.entries item has a unique id; remove duplicates or rename one of them.
